title: Sony Wh-Ch510 Bluetooth Wireless On Ear Headphones Up-To 35Hrs Playtime
description: Comfort : Lightweight, all-day listening with quality sound Bluetooth : Listen to your favourite tracks wirelessly with a Bluetooth wireless technology by pairing your smartphone or tablet. Battery Life : With up to 35 hours of battery life, youâ€™ll have enough power for even long trips away.
